title: How can the natural healing power of nature be explored?
description: Answer (1 of 12): Personally and over time. How can you stop broken bones from bicycle wrecks? Or like me, closed head injury with a broken arm and crushed shouder from a car wreck. I started with liquid oxygen and liquid vitamin b-12. And maybe it was just because of my dad that I got to do what...
